name: AddCompletedAssessmentToCandidate
description:
Adds a completed assessment to a candidate's record.

Use this tool to update a candidate's profile with a completed assessment. Requires the 'candidatesWrite' permission.

parameters.name: completed_assessment_request
parameters.description: JSON payload containing candidateId, partnerId, assessment details, and timestamp of completion.

assessmentName.description: The name of the assessment that was taken that will be displayed in the UI

metadata.description: An array of metadata associated with this completed assessment
Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
